solution_line_template: The chicken lost {cars_dodged} * {multiplier_feathers} = <<{cars_dodged}*{multiplier_feathers}={feathers_lost_second_crossing}>>{feathers_lost_second_crossing} feathers on its second road crossing.
Thus, it had {initial_feathers} - {feathers_lost_second_crossing} = <<{initial_feathers}-{feathers_lost_second_crossing}={feathers_after}>>{feathers_after} feathers after crossing the road twice.
